General.Name: Zhang Xiaoquan Inc.
General.Description: Zhang Xiaoquan Inc. engages in the design, research and development, production, sale, and servicing of household kitchen supplies, personal care supplies, garden and agricultural products, hotel kitchenware supplies, etc. to consumers in China and internationally. The company produces knives, scissors and shears, kitchen utensils, garden tools, chef supplies, handle tools, and other products; and professional care products. It also operates retail outlets. The company offers its products under the Zhang Xiaoquan brand. Zhang Xiaoquan Inc. was founded in 1628 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
